thread.section_title: Keeper® Password Manager Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keeper® Password Manager | keepersecurity.com
thread.title: Collier Schofield
thread.title_full: Keeper® Password Manager reviewed by Collier Schofield

author: Collier Schofield
title: Collier Schofield
text: I don't use all the features but the most important feature is ease of use. I provide this app to our technically challenged employees and between the desktop, web, and app versions, I am rarely resetting passwords of fielding "I can't logon" calls
